name: AVAudioSession.InterruptionReason
desc: Constants that define the reasons for an audio session interruption.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The system interrupts this audio session when it activates another.

items.name: case appWasSuspended
items.desc: The system suspends the app and interrupts the audio session.

items.name: case builtInMicMuted
items.desc: The system interrupts the audio session when the device mutes the built-in microphone.
